page.title: 09CUMBERNAULD HOME LIFE
page.content: I GOT OUT OF BED AT 7.30 A.M. I PUT ON MY DENIMS, MY T SHIRT AND CHEQUERED JERSEY.MY MUM MADE ME SOME PORRIDGE. I SET OF FOR SCHOOL AT 8.30. I HAD TIME TO PLAY FOR 15 MINUTES AND SO I PLAYED FOOTBALL.IN SCHOOL WE SAID OUR PRAYERS WE THEN DID SOME SPELLING AND DECIMAL WORK. AT PLAYTIME, I PLAYED HIDE AND SEEK. WHEN WE CAME BACK IN WE DID SEWING, THEN ENGLISH AND A DICTIONARY EXERCISE.NOW IT WAS TIME FOR LUNCH. I HAD PIE AND ROAST POTATOES. WE HAD ONE MORE INTERVAL BEFORE GOING HOME AT 3.45 P.M. I WENT OUT TO PLAY FOOTBALL AND THEN I STAYED IN ALL NIGHT TO WATCH "MIAMI VICE" ON T.V. "MIAMI VICE" IS ALL ABOUT TWO UNDERCOVER COPS CALLED "CROC" AND "SONNY".
